title: Enlightenment affects religious and social issues

content.question:
Directions: In writing your essays, use specific examples to support your answer. The suggested writing time is 30 minutes. 
Analyze the ways in which Enlightenment thought addressed religious beliefs and social issues in the eighteenth century.

frqParts.text:

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
